competitors.name: Snowflake
competitors.notes: Cloud-native data warehouse platform, major competitor in modern data cloud space

competitors.name: Databricks
competitors.notes: Unified analytics platform with lakehouse architecture, combining data lakes and warehouses

competitors.name: Google BigQuery
competitors.notes: Fully-managed serverless data warehouse from Google Cloud

competitors.name: Amazon Redshift
competitors.notes: AWS cloud data warehouse service, major cloud competitor

competitors.notes: Microsoft's integrated analytics service combining data warehousing and big data

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Traditional enterprise database and analytics competitor, Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse

competitors.name: IBM Db2 Warehouse
competitors.notes: Enterprise data warehouse solution on-premises and cloud

competitors.name: Cloudera
competitors.notes: Enterprise data cloud platform for hybrid and multi-cloud

competitors.name: Vertica
competitors.notes: Analytics data warehouse, now part of OpenText

context: Teradata Corporation is a cloud analytics and data platform company focused on enterprise data warehousing and analytics. AI/ML analytics. Cloud migration acceleration.
